titleStmt.title: A Pleasant battle between two lap dogs of the Utopian court, or, A Dialogue between asleep and awake, jest and earnest, reality and fancy being fought upon the new erected dog-pit lately contrived purposely upon this occasion as aforesaid in the anti-chamber of the said court ...

notesStmt.note: Satire on Charles II's mistresses Nell Gwyn and the Duchess of Portsmouth.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
